reviews.text:
Over over price, you need to pay for  everything.....15 euros for entry + 3 euros for the skate + 3 euros for gloves and if you think it's the end you are wrong.....6 euros for penguin  for helping the kids to learn and this is by hour.....
So if you have time and a lot of money you can come but if you have a family with 3 kids don't come it doesn't worth the money.
P.S and the service is not good
Small ice skating rink in an easy to get to and convenient location. Possibly a little overpriced but staff were friendly and helpful.
